# Temporary files
*-new.html
*-new.xml
*-new.svg
*-new.js
*-new.md

# IDE and Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Excel files (original data)
*.xlsx
*.xls
~$*.xlsx
~$*.xls

# Node modules (if you add any build tools later)
node_modules/

# Build output (if you add any build tools later)
dist/
build/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local
